body:
Heya everyone!
Since I'm coming up on 700 subscribers very soon, I've decided to do another Q&A, since you guys seemed to really enjoy the last one, and you guys have been telling me that you still had questions, which I couldn't fit in the last video.

The last Q&A was pretty long, so I'm only going to be doing around 20 questions for this one.

Also, unlike last time, you may only ask 1 question, so that others can get a chance to ask a question.

Anyways, fire away!
body_tagged:

Also, unlike last time, you may only ask 1 question, so that others can get a chance to ask a question.

Anyways, fire away!
title: 700 Subscribers Q&A - Questions Needed!

replies.body: Just to add, I won't be answering 'opinion on me' types of questions just because only a small portion of my viewers knows who you are, so it's kind of boring to answer those :)

replies.body:
Alright everyone, thanks for the questions! I'll be picking around 15-20 of them, at least 1 from everyone (2 if needed), and I'll be releasing the video once I reach 700.

Thanks again for the help :)
